speaker.whotheyare: Axel Reinaud is cofounder and CEO of NetZero, which champions biochar as a climate solution.
speaker.whylisten: Axel Reinaud brings his long-standing passion for climate and his business experience together to scale biochar, a long-term carbon-removal solution. Prior to launching NetZero, he was at BCG for 23 years where he held various client and internal leadership positions. He holds an MS in engineering and economics from École Centrale Paris and an MBA in economics from INSEAD.
